title: 24K ALTURA BY KOLTE PATIL
detail: Kolte Patil 24K Altura elevates contemporary living with its sophisticated design and premium features. These spacious 3 and 4 BHK residences are thoughtfully crafted to offer a blend of luxury and functionality. Enjoy top-of-the-line amenities such as modern modular kitchens, efficient climate control systems, and stylish glass partitions. With expansive private balconies, lush green landscapes, and exclusive facilities including a well-equipped clubhouse and fitness center, Kolte Patil 24K Altura provides an exceptional living experience where comfort and elegance come together seamlessly.
developer_detail:
Kolte-Patil Developers Ltd. is a renowned real estate developer with a strong presence in Pune, Bangalore, and Mumbai. Established in 1991 and headquartered in Pune, the company is listed on both the National Stock Exchange (NSE) and the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE).

With over three decades of experience, Kolte-Patil has earned a reputation for delivering high-quality residential and commercial projects. They have a diverse portfolio that includes integrated townships, residential complexes, commercial spaces, and IT parks.
city_description:
A glance at the map shows why Baner is considered such a great location. It is placed in a geographical sweet spot, which facilitates equal access to Pune’s many thriving neighbourhoods.

Celebrate the morning glory with the rising Sun being welcomed by cheerful chirping of rare species of birds. Befriend with the neighbouring Pashan & Baner hills and the mesmerising views. Unleash the birdwatcher and the nature-trotter in you. Explore various trails inviting from different directions.
